items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute!
items.body: I really like this dress. The fit is flattering. It can be dressed up or down. Read more
items.author: MIKED

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cotton blend material is smooth, comfortable without any itchiness after a quick wash.
items.body: This long sleeve plaid mini dress impressed me right away with its lightweight fabric that drapes effortlessly, providing a flowy silhouette perfect for the shifting temperatures of early fall into winter. The flannel is on the light side but not sheer or summery. It is a fall dress. Containing a cotton blend, the material offers a smooth, comfortable touch against the skin without any itchiness, and its medium thickness adds just enough warmth for layering under a light jacket on cooler days. Tiered ruffles along the skirt create a charming babydoll shape, while the v-neck and elastic cuffs enhance the vintage appeal, making the overall design feel both cute and flattering. Choosing medium based on the size chart turned out ideal for my 5'1" height, 39D bust, 28-29 waist, and 39 hips, fitting loosely through the body for easy movement without clinging, though the mini length falls a few inches above the knee as expected. Green plaid pattern replicates the product photos accurately—a vibrant checkered mix that's beautiful for holiday outings, with no color fading after a gentle wash. Stitching throughout holds well, from the gathered tiers to the neckline. Read more
items.author: SilverStar

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cute fabric. Wish it was the size I ordered.
items.body: This is cute but they sent me the wrong size so I can’t even give an accurate measurement as to if it would fit well. It is such a bummer because now I have to return it when I really needed it for family photos on Christmas Day. Disappointed big time. Read more
items.author: Alyrose

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Uneven breast line
items.body: Overall love the dress and the pattern and the fit so I’m not returning —-BUT it irks me that the pattern line around the bust is uneven and makes my breasts look uneven. You can see clearly in the photo what I mean. My breasts deserve better . So do yours. Read more
items.author: Amanda Catania

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable Red Plaid Dress!
items.body: This dress is adorable! The red plaid gives it that perfect vintage vibe, and the babydoll cut is super flattering and comfy. I love the tiered ruffles—they add just the right amount of flow and movement. The V-neck is cute without being too low, and the long sleeves make it great for fall. I wore it with black boots & tights and got so many compliments. Perfect for casual outings or dressing up with accessories! The fabric is a cotton/poly blend. Read more
items.author: Happy Irishman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great holiday dress!
items.body: I love tiered dresses. They are comfortable and stylish, and I love this one! It is a cotton/polyester blend that is a soft weight, smooth and comfortable on my skin. The red plaid is sharp and bold. The dress is very well made, including the seams, the gathered tiers, the neckline and the elastic at the sleeves. I am 5’ 110lbs. and the Small fits me perfectly. I typically need to raise the hem on dresses, but the hem hits about 3 inches above my knees. I felt the elastic at the sleeves looked a little awkward but I just pushed them up a bit and it looked great. I think this is a great dress for the price. I look forward to wearing it as the weather turns cooler. Read more
items.author: C B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Surprisingly Versatile Must-Have!
items.body: I was a little unsure about this dress at first—it seemed a bit like a pajama dress. But wow, was I wrong! The style is incredibly versatile. I just added a cute belt to show off my figure, and it instantly went from casual to chic. The quality of the cotton blend fabric is great—it's light, breathable, and feels amazing. Even though it has no stretch, it's very comfortable and easy to move in. The size was a perfect fit, and I love that it has pockets! For the price, the value for money is unbeatable. It seems quite durable and has held up well so far. This dress is a great find for a simple, cute fall look Read more
items.author: Jenice

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Poor fitting for XL
items.body: Does look good at all on my wife. She’s an XL and it just looks like I draped a curtain around her body. I was really hoping it would fit well since the only tight fitting part is around the chest but it didn’t. Also she hated the sleeves having elastic around her mid forearms. Read more
items.author: Zachary Rankin

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
